title: Prime Minister Internship Scheme (PMIS)
summary: Large-scale national internship programme connecting youth with internships across public and private organisations to improve employability.
eligibility: Young Indian nationals (students/young graduates) as per scheme portals; age and enrolment conditions set by the scheme.
benefits: Structured internships, stipends/allowances where applicable, exposure to industry projects and potential placements.

title: UDAN (Regional Connectivity) — modified (Budget 2025)
summary: Enhanced UDAN program to expand regional air connectivity to more tier-2/3 cities and support smaller airports and helipads.
eligibility: Air operators and airport developers as per UDAN rules; state/central agencies for infra support.
benefits: Subsidies, route support, infrastructure uplift for selected regional routes and airports.

title: Pradhan Mantri Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana
summary: Household rooftop solar initiative (announced/expanded recently) to accelerate residential clean energy adoption.
eligibility: Residential households; details and subsidy slabs per official notification.
benefits: Subsidies/assistance for rooftop solar installations; lower electricity bills and possible net metering.

title: Yuva Nidhi Scheme (State-level examples)
summary: State unemployment/assistance schemes launched recently (example: Karnataka Yuva Nidhi) providing temporary allowance/support to unemployed educated youth.
eligibility: Local state residency and educational/unemployment conditions per state notification.
benefits: Monthly allowance or stipend until employment or as defined by the state program.

title: Fund of Funds 2.0 (Expanded scope - Budget 2025)
summary: Expansion of Fund of Funds for venture capital to support startups and private sector investments in manufacturing and strategic sectors.
eligibility: Fund managers and qualifying investees as defined under scheme rules.
benefits: Capital support, co-investment and credit line boosting private investment into strategic sectors.

title: Swamih Fund / Housing Completion Window (Continuing)
summary: Special financing window to complete stressed and stalled housing projects and make units available to homebuyers.
eligibility: Housing project developers and stalled project beneficiaries as per fund rules.
benefits: Financing to complete projects, reduce stalled inventory and protect homebuyers’ interests.

title: Maritime Development Fund (Budget 2025 announcement)
summary: A corpus fund to modernise ports and maritime infrastructure with private sector participation.
eligibility: Port projects, developers and operators as defined by fund rules.
benefits: Long-term financing support and incentives for maritime infrastructure projects.

title: New Scheme for Plug-and-Play Industrial Parks (DPIIT)
summary: Capital support and incentives for ready-to-move industrial parks to encourage incremental manufacturing capacity.
eligibility: Industrial park developers and participating units meeting sector criteria.
benefits: Subsidy/capital support to set up plug-and-play facilities and reduce time-to-operate for manufacturers.

title: PM Awas Yojana (Gramin & Urban) — Ongoing
summary: Affordable housing programme to provide pucca houses with basic amenities to eligible urban and rural poor households.
eligibility: Economically weaker sections, beneficiaries according to income and priority categories.
benefits: Financial assistance / subsidies for house construction or enhancement.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN) — Ongoing
summary: Direct income support to small and marginal farmer families to supplement agricultural income.
eligibility: Small and marginal landholder farmer families registered under scheme rules.
benefits: Periodic direct cash transfers into beneficiaries' bank accounts.

title: Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
summary: National health protection scheme providing health insurance coverage for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization to eligible families.
eligibility: Beneficiaries identified via SECC / state lists as low-income families.
benefits: Cashless hospitalisation cover for defined packages; empanelled public/private hospitals provide treatment.

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (LPG connection support)
summary: Provides subsidised LPG connections to women from deprived households to improve clean cooking access.
eligibility: Eligible low-income households with priority categories defined in scheme guidelines.
benefits: Initial LPG connection subsidy and periodic refill support schemes as defined by the centre/state.

title: National Digital Health Mission / HealthStack (components continuing)
summary: Digital health ecosystem building blocks — digital health IDs, health records and interoperable systems.
eligibility: Citizens and healthcare providers using the system.
benefits: Portable digital health records and streamlined access to services and scheme benefits.

title: Skill India / National Skill Development Programs
summary: Large-scale skilling, reskilling and apprenticeship programs to improve workforce employability.
eligibility: Youth and job seekers as per program/centre-state guidelines.
benefits: Training, certification, stipends and placement support under multiple schemes and partners.

title: MGNREGA (Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act)
summary: Guaranteed rural employment program providing at least 100 days of wage employment to rural households.
eligibility: Adult rural households wanting unskilled manual work; local registration required.
benefits: Wage payments, rural assets creation, food and income support during lean seasons.

title: Startup India (Support package & incentives)
summary: Policy and institutional support to startups including funding, incubation, tax/Regulatory easing and mentorship.
eligibility: Recognised startups that meet eligibility conditions under the Startup India portal.
benefits: Tax exemptions (where applicable), easier compliance, access to funds and mentorship.

title: Stand Up India Scheme
summary: Facilitates bank loans between ₹10 lakh and ₹1 crore to at least one Scheduled Caste (SC) or Scheduled Tribe (ST) borrower and at least one woman borrower per bank branch for setting up a greenfield enterprise.
eligibility: SC/ST and/or woman entrepreneurs—other detailed conditions apply per scheme guidelines.
benefits: Bank loans with supportive credit lines and handholding support.

title: PM Shram Yogi Maan-Dhan / Social Security for informal workers
summary: Pension and social security schemes for unorganised sector workers to provide old-age income security.
eligibility: Unorganised sector workers meeting age and contribution criteria; registration required.
benefits: Pension or contributory benefits depending on the specific sub-scheme.

title: Jal Jeevan Mission (Rural Drinking Water)
summary: Objective to provide piped water connection to every rural household and ensure potable water supply.
eligibility: Rural households; implementation through states and local bodies.
benefits: Piped potable water supply to households, community taps and village water systems.

title: Green Credit / Sustainability Incentives (Budget 2025 provisions)
summary: Incentives and credit lines to promote sustainable projects (green credit) and encourage decarbonisation investments.
eligibility: Enterprises and projects meeting eligibility under the scheme guidelines.
benefits: Access to green credit lines, incentives for low-carbon investments and related support.

title: One Nation One Ration Card (ONORC)
summary: Portable ration card system enabling beneficiaries to access subsidised foodgrains across India.
eligibility: Households registered under NFSA with ration cards; portability across participating states.
benefits: Access to PDS benefits anywhere in participating states; portability and reduced leakage.

title: PM Vishwakarma Yojana
summary: Skill development and support scheme for artisans, craftspeople and traditional workers to improve livelihoods.
eligibility: Artisans / traditional craft workers; registration requirements per scheme portal.
benefits: Training, tools, design and market linkages; credit and institutional support.

title: PM eBus Sewa
summary: Support for electric public bus deployment to improve urban electric mobility under a PPP model.
eligibility: Urban local bodies and bus operators participating in scheme tenders.
benefits: Subsidies / support for procurement and operation of electric buses; infrastructure support.

title: Amrit Bharat Station Scheme
summary: Redevelopment of railway stations to modernize facilities and create integrated multi-modal hubs.
eligibility: Selected railway stations and implementing agencies under Ministry of Railways.
benefits: Improved passenger amenities, commercial and community spaces, modernization grants.

title: PM-POSHAN / Saksham Anganwadi & Poshan 2.0
summary: Comprehensive nutrition and early childhood care program including midday meals and anganwadi strengthening.
eligibility: Children, adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating mothers per scheme criteria.
benefits: Nutritional supplements, mid-day meals, anganwadi services and maternal care interventions.

title: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS)
summary: Incentivises employers to hire apprentices, expanding apprenticeship training and employer participation.
eligibility: Employers and apprentices as per NAPS rules.
benefits: Financial incentives to employers, stipend support for apprentices and increased training slots.

title: PM Dhan-Dhanya Krishi Yojana (Budget 2025)
summary: New agriculture initiative to strengthen district-level agri value chains and boost pulses/foodgrain production.
eligibility: Farmers and district-level executing units per scheme rules.
benefits: Support for input, procurement and processing to improve farmer incomes and self-reliance.

title: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana (PM-KISAN)
summary: Direct income support to small and marginal farmer families to augment their income.
eligibility: Small and marginal landholder farmer families registered with the scheme.
benefits: Periodic direct cash transfers into beneficiary accounts.

title: National Rural Livelihoods Mission (NRLM) / Aajeevika
summary: Supports rural poor for livelihoods promotion through community institutions and financial inclusion.
eligibility: Rural poor households and SHGs organized under NRLM.
benefits: Skill training, microcredit linkage, SHG support and enterprise promotion.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
summary: Financial inclusion program to ensure access to banking services, small savings and insurance.
eligibility: All Indian citizens lacking bank accounts; KYC per bank rules.
benefits: Zero-balance bank accounts, RuPay cards, accidental insurance cover and overdraft facilities.

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
summary: Provides subsidised LPG connections to women from deprived households.
eligibility: Eligible low-income families per scheme guidelines.
benefits: Support for initial LPG connection subsidy and access to clean cooking fuel.

title: National Solar Mission / rooftop solar initiatives
summary: Support for rooftop solar adoption including household and institutional solar schemes.
eligibility: Households, institutions and MSMEs depending on scheme subcomponent.
benefits: Capital subsidy, net metering, concessional finance for solar installations.

title: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
summary: Agricultural credit scheme providing short-term credit to farmers for crop production and allied activities.
eligibility: Farmers and eligible individuals in agriculture and allied sectors.
benefits: Access to affordable credit, working capital, and crop loans under subsidized terms in some cases.

title: Safai Mitra Suraksha (Welfare for sanitation workers)
summary: Welfare and social security measures targeted at sanitation workers and their families.
eligibility: Sanitation workers registered under municipal/local programmes.
benefits: Insurance, skill training, pension linkages and health benefits.

title: National AYUSH Mission
summary: Promotes holistic AYUSH healthcare systems via infrastructure, training and healthcare services.
eligibility: AYUSH practitioners, institutions and patients using AYUSH services.
benefits: Support for health facilities, training, public awareness and medicinal plant development.

title: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maan-Dhan (PM-SYM)
summary: Contributory pension scheme for unorganised sector workers to provide old-age income security.
eligibility: Unorganized sector workers below specified age limits who register voluntarily.
benefits: Monthly pension after retirement depending on contributions.

title: National Digital Health Mission (NDHM) / Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission
summary: Digital health IDs, health records and interoperable standards for health data portability.
eligibility: All citizens and healthcare providers adopting the digital platform.
benefits: Portability of records, easier access to healthcare services and claims processing.

title: PM-SVANidhi (Street Vendor’s AtmaNirbhar Nidhi)
summary: Micro-credit scheme for street vendors to restart livelihoods post disruptions.
eligibility: Eligible street vendors identified per UMANG/municipal lists.
benefits: Affordable collateral-free working capital loans and incentives for timely repayment.

title: National Education Mission (Samagra Shiksha)
summary: Integrated scheme supporting school education from pre-nursery to class 12 with equity and quality measures.
eligibility: Students and educational institutions under participating states.
benefits: Funding for infrastructure, learning materials, teacher training and inclusive education.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
summary: Short-term skill training and certification to boost employability under Skill India.
eligibility: Youth and job-seekers enrolled into PMKVY training centers.
benefits: Free/paid training, assessment, and certification with placement linkages.

title: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana (PMGKAY)
summary: Foodgrain distribution scheme to provide free foodgrains to needy households during special periods.
eligibility: Beneficiaries registered under NFSA and targeted support lists.
benefits: Free or subsidised foodgrain rations during coverage period.

title: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)
summary: Conditional cash transfer maternity benefit scheme for pregnant and lactating women.
eligibility: Pregnant women and lactating mothers meeting scheme conditions.
benefits: Cash transfers to support nutrition and maternal care during pregnancy and early motherhood.

title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
summary: Small-savings scheme for the girl child encouraging parents to build a fund for her future education and marriage.
eligibility: Parents/guardians of girl child born on or after specified date and meeting KYC.
benefits: High interest small-savings account with tax benefits under specified conditions.

title: National Urban Livelihoods Mission (Day-NULM)
summary: Promotes sustainable livelihoods for urban poor through training, enterprise and self-employment support.
eligibility: Urban poor households and beneficiaries identified by implementing agencies.
benefits: Skill training, credit access, shelter for urban homeless and institutional support.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Kendras (PMKK)
summary: Network of skill training centers providing industry-relevant skilling under Skill India.
eligibility: Youth and jobseekers enrolled at PMKK centers.
benefits: Free/paid training, industry linkages, placement support and certification.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
summary: Crop insurance scheme to stabilize farmer incomes by sharing crop failure risk.
eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops and enrolled in the notified season.
benefits: Indemnity payments for crop losses at notified rates and expedited claims.

title: PM SVANidhi Plus (Expanded)
summary: Enhanced working capital and growth support for street vendors who have repaid initial loans.
eligibility: Street vendors who successfully repaid PM-SVANidhi loans and meet renewal criteria.
benefits: Larger loan amounts, easier terms and growth incentives.

title: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY) Expansion Components
summary: Ongoing expansion and benefit package updates to the national health protection scheme for poor families.
eligibility: Beneficiaries identified via SECC and state lists as per PM-JAY rules.
benefits: Cashless hospitalisation across empanelled hospitals for defined care packages.

title: National Ayushman Bharat Health Infrastructure Mission
summary: Infrastructure strengthening to expand health system capacity, including labs, oxygen supplies and primary hospitals.
eligibility: Health infrastructure projects and public health units under central/state plans.
benefits: Capital grants, equipment and capacity-building support to health facilities.

title: PRASAD (Pilgrimage Rejuvenation And Spiritual, Heritage Augmentation Drive) Scheme
summary: Integrated development of pilgrimage infrastructure and heritage sites to boost tourism and facilities.
eligibility: Pilgrimage/heritage destinations and implementing agencies.
benefits: Infrastructure upgrades, sanitation improvements and institutional support for pilgrim facilities.

title: Gram Swaraj / Panchayat Level Development Programmes
summary: Village-level development and decentralized planning funding to strengthen local governance.
eligibility: Gram Panchayats and local bodies implementing poverty-reduction/development projects.
benefits: Grants for local infrastructure, livelihoods, water and sanitation projects.

title: Mission POSHAN 2.0 (Nutrition umbrella)
summary: Umbrella mission to combat malnutrition covering anganwadis, mid-day meals and maternal nutrition.
eligibility: Children, adolescent girls and pregnant/lactating mothers as per program lists.
benefits: Nutrition supplements, growth monitoring and community-level interventions.

title: Jal Jeevan Mission — Har Ghar Jal
summary: Ensuring functional household tap connections providing safe drinking water to every rural household.
eligibility: Rural households; implementation via Gram Panchayats and state governments.
benefits: Piped potable water supply to households and community water systems.

title: National Tuberculosis Elimination Programme (NTEP)
summary: Comprehensive programme to screen, diagnose and treat TB with focus on elimination targets.
eligibility: All citizens with suspected TB symptoms and identified contacts per public health protocols.
benefits: Free diagnosis, treatment and support under the national programme.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gramin Awas Yojana (PMAY-G)
summary: Affordable housing for rural poor with assistance for constructing pucca houses for eligible households.
eligibility: Rural households meeting eligibility criteria under PMAY-G.
benefits: Financial assistance for construction/house improvement, technical support and subsidies.

title: One District One Product (ODOP)
summary: Upgrade local industry and crafts by promoting a single product per district to boost manufacturing and exports.
eligibility: District-level manufacturers, artisans and implementing agencies.
benefits: Market access, branding support, capacity building and export promotion.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY)
summary: Rural roads connectivity programme to provide all-weather road access to unconnected habitations.
eligibility: Rural habitations requiring connectivity as per PMGSY criteria.
benefits: Construction and upgradation of rural roads and bridges.

title: National Clean Air Programme (NCAP)
summary: Framework to reduce particulate pollution through city-specific action plans and monitoring.
eligibility: Cities and urban local bodies identified under NCAP.
benefits: Technical assistance, monitoring systems and funding for air quality improvement measures.

title: Pradhan Mantri Formalisation of Micro food processing Enterprises (PMFME)
summary: Supports micro food processors with finance, marketing and capacity building for enterprise formalisation.
eligibility: Micro food processing units and clusters under the PMFME programme.
benefits: Credit linked subsidies, skills, branding and market access assistance.

title: National Livestock Mission
summary: Supports livestock development, health services and productivity improvement across animal husbandry sectors.
eligibility: Livestock farmers and implementing agencies under mission interventions.
benefits: Veterinary services, breed improvement, feed and management support.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gramin Digital Saksharta Abhiyan (PMGDISHA)
summary: Digital literacy programme to make rural households digitally literate.
eligibility: Rural citizens aged above a threshold who are not digitally literate.
benefits: Basic digital skills training, certification and community facilitation.

title: National Highway Development Programme (NHDP) components
summary: Periodic central programmes to upgrade national highways, expressways and arterial road networks.
eligibility: National highway projects identified for upgradation and expansion.
benefits: Funding and project support for national highway expansion and improvements.

title: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
summary: Micro-credit (MUDRA) loans for small businesses and micro-enterprises under Shishu/ Kishor/ Tarun categories.
eligibility: Micro/small entrepreneurs and small business owners.
benefits: Collateral-free working capital loans via banks and MFIs with various loan limits.

title: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Rozgar Nigam (PMKRN) — job centric programs
summary: Employment facilitation and bridging skill demand-supply via placement-linked training.
eligibility: Job-seekers and employers enrolling in PMKRN-managed programs.
benefits: Placement support, training and employer engagement.

title: Stand Up India (continued support and modifications)
summary: Facilitates bank loans to SC/ST and women entrepreneurs for greenfield enterprises.
eligibility: SC/ST and/or women entrepreneurs as per scheme guidelines.
benefits: Access to bank credit, handholding support and priority lending.

title: National Bamboo Mission
summary: Promotes bamboo cultivation, processing and value chain development in select regions.
eligibility: Farmers, cooperatives and entrepreneurs in eligible regions.
benefits: Support for cultivation, technology transfer, market and processing infrastructure.

title: Mahila Shakti Kendra (MSK)
summary: Community-based interventions for women empowerment, skill building and access to entitlements.
eligibility: Women beneficiaries and community-level implementing agencies.
benefits: Skill training, counselling, awareness and linkages to schemes and credit.

title: National Livelihoods Mission - Urban (DAY-NULM) support components
summary: Enterprise and self-employment support for urban poor along with shelter and skill components.
eligibility: Urban poor households and beneficiaries through ULBs.
benefits: Skill training, credit linkages, shelter schemes and employment support.

title: National Bamboo & Kusha Mission (variants)
summary: State-central programmes promoting non-timber forest produce, bamboo and allied livelihoods.
eligibility: Forest-dependent communities, farmers and entrepreneurs.
benefits: Technical support, marketing and value chain development.

title: PM-DevINE (Development Initiative for North East)
summary: Special window for infrastructure and development projects in North-Eastern States and Himalayan regions.
eligibility: Projects and implementing agencies in NE states.
benefits: Central funding support, infrastructure development and project support.

title: Aspirational Blocks / Districts convergence programs
summary: Targeted interventions across aspirational districts to improve health, education and livelihoods.
eligibility: Blocks/districts identified under Aspirational Districts Programme.
benefits: Convergent funding, diagnostics and rapid reform support.

title: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana - Rural Connectivity continued
summary: Supports last-mile connectivity for rural habitations with all-weather road access.
eligibility: Rural habitations in need of road connectivity under PMGSY norms.
benefits: Road construction funding and rural infrastructure upgrades.

title: National Food Security Mission (NFSM) - pulses & oilseeds components
summary: Crop-specific mission to boost production of pulses, oilseeds and cereals via improved seeds and technology.
eligibility: Farmers of targeted crops in notified districts and regions.
benefits: Input support, extension services and procurement support measures.

title: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
summary: Promotes climate-resilient agricultural practices and efficient water use.
eligibility: Farmers and agri-projects adopting climate-smart agriculture.
benefits: Technology support, demonstration projects and farmer training.

title: Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation (AMRUT)
summary: Urban infrastructure mission focusing on water supply, sewerage and urban transport.
eligibility: Urban Local Bodies in mission list.
benefits: Funding for urban infrastructure, projects and capacity building.

title: PM Vishwakarma Yojana
summary: A central scheme supporting traditional artisans and craftspeople with skill training, toolkits, loans, and market linkages.
eligibility: Indian citizens belonging to 18 traditional artisan trades such as carpenter, goldsmith, barber, mason, tailor, etc.
benefits: Skill training; toolkit incentives up to ₹15,000; collateral-free loan up to ₹3 lakh; stipend; digital enablement.

title: PM PRANAM Scheme
summary: Central government initiative to reduce chemical fertilizer usage and promote sustainable alternatives.
eligibility: Farmers and state governments adopting eco-friendly agricultural practices.
benefits: Financial incentives for reducing chemical fertilizer consumption; support for organic and bio-fertilizers.

title: e-Shram Portal Social Security Scheme
summary: National database and support scheme for unorganized workers providing access to social security benefits.
eligibility: Unorganized workers aged 16–59 with Aadhaar-linked mobile number.
benefits: Accident insurance up to ₹2 lakh; priority access to future welfare schemes.

title: Tamil Nadu Pudhumai Penn Scheme
summary: Financial assistance for girl students who have completed schooling in government schools.
eligibility: Girls studying in government schools who join higher education institutions.
benefits: ₹1,000 per month financial support till completion of degree.

title: Madhya Pradesh Ladli Behna Yojana
summary: A women's welfare initiative providing monthly financial support to improve economic independence.
eligibility: Women aged 21–60 residing in MP with family income below ₹2.5 lakh.
benefits: ₹1,250 per month direct benefit transfer.

title: Rajasthan Mukhyamantri Chiranjeevi Health Insurance Scheme
summary: A universal healthcare scheme providing large-scale health insurance coverage for residents.
eligibility: Rajasthan residents including NFSA, SECC families, and other specified groups.
benefits: Cashless health coverage up to ₹25 lakh per family.

title: Delhi Mukhyamantri Mahila Samman Yojana
summary: Income support scheme for adult women residing in Delhi.
eligibility: Women above 18 years with residence proof, excluding taxpayers.
benefits: ₹1,000 per month allowance.

title: Pradhan Mantri TB Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan
summary: National mission to eliminate tuberculosis by 2025 with nutrition and treatment support.
eligibility: All TB patients registered under Nikshay Portal.
benefits: ₹500 monthly nutrition support; free diagnosis and treatment.

title: West Bengal Lakshmir Bhandar Scheme
summary: Income support scheme for women aged 25–60 in West Bengal.
eligibility: Women aged 25–60 except taxpayers and government employees.
benefits: ₹500 to ₹1,000 monthly depending on category.

title: Mission Vatsalya
summary: A central mission for child welfare, protection, and adoption services.
eligibility: Children in need of protection including orphans, abandoned, and those in conflict situations.
benefits: Support for shelters, adoption, foster care, counselling.

title: Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission (ABDM)
summary: Digital health ID creation and national health records framework.
eligibility: All residents of India.
benefits: Unique health ID; digital health records; interoperable access to healthcare.

title: PM Gati Shakti National Master Plan
summary: A national infrastructure master plan for unified, multi-modal connectivity.
eligibility: Government agencies and approved infrastructure projects.
benefits: Faster approvals; integrated planning; reduced logistics cost.

title: Uttar Pradesh Swami Vivekananda Youth Empowerment Scheme
summary: Youth skill development and employment support scheme.
eligibility: Youth aged 18–40 registered in UP.
benefits: Skill training, entrepreneurship assistance, career guidance.

title: Kerala MEDISEP Health Insurance Scheme
summary: A medical insurance scheme for government employees and pensioners of Kerala.
eligibility: Kerala government employees and pensioners.
benefits: Cashless health insurance up to ₹3 lakh annually.

title: Haryana Chirayu-Ayushman Bharat
summary: Extended Ayushman Bharat health coverage for families with annual income up to ₹3 lakh.
eligibility: Families earning under ₹3 lakh per year.
benefits: Health insurance coverage up to ₹5 lakh.

title: PM Matsya Sampada Yojana
summary: A national scheme to improve the fisheries sector and enhance fishermen income.
eligibility: Fishermen, fish vendors, aquaculture farmers.
benefits: Financial aid for equipment, cold chains, fish processing.

title: Bihar Student Credit Card Scheme
summary: Easy education loans for students of Bihar pursuing higher studies.
eligibility: Students with Bihar domicile enrolled in recognized institutions.
benefits: Loan up to ₹4 lakh at low interest.

title: Assam Orunodoi Scheme
summary: Monthly financial assistance to economically weaker women.
eligibility: Women belonging to low-income families.
benefits: ₹1,250 per month.

title: Jammu and Kashmir Mumkin Scheme
summary: Youth livelihood scheme enabling purchase of commercial vehicles.
eligibility: Unemployed youth of J&K aged 18–35.
benefits: Up to ₹2.5 lakh subsidy for vehicle purchase.

title: Sikkim One Family One Job Scheme
summary: Government scheme to provide at least one job per family.
eligibility: Unemployed youth with Sikkim domicile.
benefits: Assured employment in various state departments.

title: PM Surakshit Matritva Abhiyan
summary: Free antenatal checkups for pregnant women across India.
eligibility: Pregnant women registered under health centres.
benefits: Free checkups on 9th of every month; diagnostics; counselling.

title: Gujarat Vanbandhu Kalyan Yojana
summary: Massive tribal development programme improving education, roads, housing.
eligibility: Scheduled Tribe communities of Gujarat.
benefits: Housing, scholarships, infrastructure support.

title: Odisha Biju Swasthya Kalyan Yojana
summary: State health coverage scheme for economically vulnerable families.
eligibility: Families listed under NFSA/ SFSA plus general population in OPD.
benefits: ₹5 lakh coverage for families; ₹10 lakh for women.

title: Punjab Ghar Ghar Rozgar Scheme
summary: Employment and skill development scheme for Punjab youth.
eligibility: Residents aged 18–40.
benefits: Job fairs, training, placement support.

title: Jharkhand Savitribai Phule Kishori Samriddhi Yojana
summary: Financial support for girls to reduce dropouts.
eligibility: Girls from low-income families in Jharkhand.
benefits: ₹40,000 support from class 8 to 12.

title: National Urban Housing Scheme (State-Central mix)
summary: Assists affordable housing projects in urban areas through subsidised loans and incentives.
eligibility: Low- and middle-income urban households and participating developers.
benefits: Subsidies for interest, priority allotment and concessional finance.

title: State Skill Internship Fellowship
summary: Short-term paid internships organized by state governments for local youth to gain work experience.
eligibility: Residents of the respective state enrolled in or recently graduated from colleges.
benefits: Stipend during internship, certificate and potential placement pipelines.

title: Micro Irrigation Subsidy Programme
summary: Support for drip and sprinkler irrigation adoption to conserve water and raise farm productivity.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers adopting approved micro-irrigation systems.
benefits: Capital subsidy on equipment and technical support for installation.

title: State Women Entrepreneurship Booster
summary: State-level package to support women entrepreneurs with training, seed grants and credit facilitation.
eligibility: Women entrepreneurs registered in the state with viable business plans.
benefits: Seed grants, preferential credit access and market linkages.

title: Rural Digital Hubs Initiative
summary: Creates digital hubs in rural blocks providing internet access, skilling and e-governance services.
eligibility: Rural local bodies and community groups implementing digital hub facilities.
benefits: Infrastructure support, training and subsidised connectivity.

title: State Farmer Market (RythuBazaar) Expansion
summary: Expanded farmers' markets to improve farmer prices and reduce middlemen.
eligibility: Local farmers and producer groups with produce for retail sale.
benefits: Market space allocation, logistic support and buyer linkages.

title: Urban Waste to Wealth Programme
summary: Municipal-level initiative to convert urban waste into value-added products and energy.
eligibility: Municipalities and PPP partners with waste processing proposals.
benefits: Capital grants, technical support and revenue-sharing models.

title: State Solar Rooftop Acceleration Scheme
summary: State-led rooftop solar promotion with incentives for residential and institutional adoption.
eligibility: Households, institutions and MSMEs in the state opting for rooftop solar.
benefits: Top-up subsidies, facilitation and net-metering support.

title: Community Health Volunteer Programme
summary: Trains local volunteers to support primary healthcare outreach and basic diagnostics.
eligibility: Local residents willing to serve as trained community health volunteers.
benefits: Training, small honorarium and linkages to primary health centres.

title: Rural Women Self-Help Enterprise Grant
summary: Grants for SHG-led rural enterprises to scale micro-enterprises led by women.
eligibility: Registered women SHGs and collective enterprises in rural areas.
benefits: Seed grants, capacity building and market facilitation.

title: Electric Two-Wheeler Subsidy Scheme
summary: Incentives for adoption of electric two-wheelers to reduce urban pollution and fuel dependence.
eligibility: Individuals and fleet operators purchasing approved e-two-wheelers.
benefits: Purchase subsidy and concessional finance facilitation.

title: State Urban Skill Hub
summary: State-run skill hubs focused on local industry needs to improve employability.
eligibility: Youth and jobseekers residing in urban areas of the state.
benefits: Industry-aligned training, apprenticeship placements and placement support.

title: Smallholder Livestock Support Scheme
summary: Assistance to small livestock keepers for vaccine, feed and breed improvement services.
eligibility: Small livestock owners and backyard farmers.
benefits: Subsidised vaccines, fodder support and veterinary extension.

title: State Start-up Seed Grant
summary: Provides early-stage seed grants and mentorship to promising startups within the state.
eligibility: Early-stage startups incorporated/registered in the state and meeting selection criteria.
benefits: Seed funding, incubation space and mentor network access.

title: Community Water Conservation Programme
summary: Local water conservation projects—check dams, recharge pits—implemented with community participation.
eligibility: Gram Panchayats and community groups proposing water conservation projects.
benefits: Capital support, technical assistance and maintenance training.

title: State Micro-Enterprises Digital Onboarding
summary: Digital onboarding and e-marketplace access for micro-enterprises to increase sales reach.
eligibility: MSMEs and micro-enterprises registered in the state.
benefits: Training, platform access and transaction support.

title: Green Village Electrification Programme
summary: Promotes mini-grid and renewable solutions for electrification of remote villages.
eligibility: Remote gram panchayats lacking grid reliability or off-grid feasibility.
benefits: Grants for mini-grid installation, training and maintenance support.

title: State Farmer Input Subsidy (Seed & Fertiliser)
summary: State-level subsidised input support to reduce production costs for small farmers.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers registered with state agriculture departments.
benefits: Discounted seeds, subsidised fertiliser, and input vouchers.

title: Urban Green Cover & Tree Plantation Drive
summary: Urban afforestation projects supported by municipal bodies and citizen groups.
eligibility: Municipalities and resident welfare associations implementing plantation proposals.
benefits: Sapling supply, technical guidance and maintenance support.

title: State School Nutrition Enhancement
summary: Augmented mid-day meal components and school nutrition programs to improve child health.
eligibility: Government school children and anganwadi beneficiaries.
benefits: Enhanced meal quality, micronutrient supplements and kitchen infrastructure.

title: Rural Road Maintenance & Safety Scheme
summary: Maintenance grants for existing rural roads and road safety measures in villages.
eligibility: Panchayats and rural local bodies responsible for road upkeep.
benefits: Grants for resurfacing, signage, and community awareness campaigns.

title: State Women Health & Nutrition Clinics
summary: Dedicated primary clinics offering women-specific health and nutrition services.
eligibility: Women and adolescent girls registered in the state health system.
benefits: Counselling, screening, and linkages to maternal and nutrition schemes.

title: State Tourism Micro-Grant
summary: Small grants to develop local tourism experiences and homestay clusters.
eligibility: Community tourism groups, homestay owners and local entrepreneurs.
benefits: Seed grants, training and marketing support.

title: Cold Chain Support for Horticulture
summary: Financial support for cold storage and post-harvest infrastructure to reduce losses.
eligibility: Farmer producer organisations (FPOs) and cooperatives.
benefits: Subsidies for cold chain equipment, technical assistance and capacity building.

title: State Solar Schools Initiative
summary: Install rooftop solar on government schools to reduce electricity costs and educate students.
eligibility: Government schools and education departments in the state.
benefits: Rooftop solar installations, education modules and reduced electricity bills.

title: Local Public Transport Modernisation Scheme
summary: Support for modernising city bus fleets and last-mile connectivity solutions.
eligibility: Municipal transport undertakings and urban local bodies.
benefits: Capital subsidy, concessional loans and technical advisory support.

title: State Cold-Chain for Dairy Producers
summary: Support for milk collection, chilling and cold-chain for small dairy farmers.
eligibility: Dairy cooperatives and milk producer groups.
benefits: Grants for chilling units, transport and quality testing facilities.

title: Urban Informal Worker Support Programme
summary: Help for urban informal workers with training, micro-credit and social security registration.
eligibility: Urban informal sector workers lacking formal social protection.
benefits: Skill training, low-cost credit and linkage to social security schemes.

title: State Renewable Energy Co-Op Scheme
summary: Support for community-owned renewable energy co-operatives and microgrids.
eligibility: Community groups and co-operatives forming renewable energy projects.
benefits: Capital grants, technical support and revenue models.

title: School Sanitation & Hygiene Upgrade
summary: Upgrades to school sanitation facilities and menstrual hygiene management.
eligibility: Government and aided schools implementing hygiene upgrades.
benefits: Toilet construction/repair, water supply, and awareness programmes.

title: State Cold-Chain for Fisheries
summary: Post-harvest cold chain support for fishers to reduce wastage and improve prices.
eligibility: Fisher producer organisations, landing centres and cooperative societies.
benefits: Grants for cold storage, ice plants and transport facilities.

title: Local Heritage Conservation Grants
summary: Small grants to preserve local heritage sites and promote community tourism.
eligibility: Local bodies, NGOs and community groups managing heritage sites.
benefits: Restoration grants, conservation training and marketing support.

title: Green Skill Development Programme
summary: Training programmes focused on green jobs — solar technicians, waste management and energy audits.
eligibility: Youth and jobseekers enrolling in green skill courses.
benefits: Skill certification, placement support and stipends during training.

title: Affordable Childcare Centres (Crèche Scheme)
summary: Establishes affordable childcare centres near workplaces and in urban slums.
eligibility: Working mothers, low-income households and informal workers.
benefits: Safe childcare, early learning and nutritional support.

title: State Electric Vehicle Charging Network
summary: Creates a public EV charging infrastructure network across highways and urban centres.
eligibility: State transport agencies, highway authorities and private operators.
benefits: Capital support and facilitation for charging stations.

title: Rural Entrepreneurship Incubation Centers
summary: Incubators focused on rural start-ups and agri-business innovations.
eligibility: Rural entrepreneurs, agri-startups and FPOs.
benefits: Mentorship, workspace, seed grants and pilot support.

title: State Housing Repair & Improvement Scheme
summary: Small grants to repair and improve existing houses of low-income families.
eligibility: Low-income households needing repair assistance.
benefits: Grants for roofing, sanitation, and minor structural repairs.

title: Local Market Digitalisation Grant
summary: Support for street vendors and small traders to adopt digital payments and inventory tools.
eligibility: Small traders and vendors in municipal markets.
benefits: Subsidised POS devices, training and digital onboarding.

title: State Agroforestry Promotion Scheme
summary: Promotes agroforestry systems to diversify farmer incomes and improve environmental benefits.
eligibility: Farmers and landowners adopting agroforestry models.
benefits: Support for saplings, training and market linkages for agroforestry produce.

title: Urban Affordable Sanitation Upgrade
summary: Upgrades community and household sanitation in urban poor settlements.
eligibility: Urban low-income settlements and ULB-supported projects.
benefits: Toilet construction, desludging support and behaviour-change campaigns.

title: State Cold-Chain for Fruits & Vegetables
summary: Investments in post-harvest cold chain and pack-houses for horticulture produce.
eligibility: FPOs, cooperatives and private operators in horticulture clusters.
benefits: Grants for cold storage, pack-houses and cold transport.

title: Rural Women SHG Digital Literacy
summary: Digital literacy programs for women SHG members to access e-services and markets.
eligibility: Women members of registered SHGs in rural areas.
benefits: Basic digital skills training and smartphone usage support.

title: State Public Health Laboratory Strengthening
summary: Upgrades and equips state-level public health labs for diagnostics and outbreak response.
eligibility: State health departments and public health lab networks.
benefits: Equipment grants, training and sample testing support.

title: Local Artisan Marketplaces Programme
summary: Supports creation of marketplaces and e-market presence for local artisans and craftsmen.
eligibility: Artisan groups and cooperative societies.
benefits: Market stalls, e-commerce onboarding and design support.

title: State Urban Affordable Transport Pass
summary: Discounted monthly transport passes for low-income urban commuters.
eligibility: Low-income workers and students in participating cities.
benefits: Subsidised monthly pass for public transport.

title: Rural Entrepreneurship Loan Guarantee
summary: Credit guarantee scheme to improve bank lending to rural micro-entrepreneurs.
eligibility: Rural micro-entrepreneurs and small businesses seeking loans.
benefits: Partial loan guarantees, enabling easier bank credit access.

title: Climate Resilient Crop Promotion
summary: Promotes climate-resilient seeds and practices to reduce vulnerability to extreme weather.
eligibility: Farmers adopting recommended climate-resilient varieties and practices.
benefits: Subsidies for seeds, training and demonstration plots.

title: State School Digital Classrooms
summary: Equips government schools with digital classrooms and teacher training.
eligibility: Government schools and teachers in the state.
benefits: AV equipment, connectivity and teacher capacity building.

title: Rural Market Linkage for FPOs
summary: Market linkages and aggregation support for farmer producer organisations.
eligibility: Registered FPOs and farmer cooperatives.
benefits: Aggregator support, buyer facilitation and logistics grants.

title: State Small-Scale Tourism Circuit Development
summary: Develops mini-tourism circuits to boost local economies and heritage promotion.
eligibility: Local tourism boards, community tourism groups and municipalities.
benefits: Infrastructure grants, training and promotion support.

title: PM Surya Ghar: Muft Bijli Yojana
summary: Rooftop solar scheme offering subsidies to households to install solar panels and get free electricity quota per month.
eligibility: All Indian households with rooftop access.
benefits: Subsidy on rooftop solar and up to 300 units free electricity.

title: PM-JANMAN (Particularly Vulnerable Tribal Groups Mission)
summary: Comprehensive development mission for PVTG communities focusing on housing, health, education and livelihood.
eligibility: Families identified as PVTG across India.
benefits: Housing, livelihood support, education facilities and healthcare access.

title: IndiaAI Mission
summary: National initiative to build AI compute capabilities, skilling, datasets and AI startup ecosystem.
eligibility: Startups, researchers, institutions engaged in AI development.
benefits: Funding, compute access, AI innovation support.

title: Lakhpati Didi Yojana
summary: A mission to empower rural women SHG members by enabling them to earn at least ₹1 lakh per year.
eligibility: Women Self-Help Group members.
benefits: Skill training, micro-enterprise support, market linkage.

title: Vande Bharat Trains Expansion
summary: Railway modernization program to operate semi-high-speed Vande Bharat trains across key routes.
eligibility: Indian Railways planned routes and passenger services.
benefits: Faster connectivity, better passenger comfort.

title: National Green Hydrogen Mission
summary: Mission to support production, storage and use of green hydrogen for clean energy transition.
eligibility: Renewable energy producers, industries and innovators.
benefits: Incentives, R&D funding and infrastructure support.

title: National Education Policy 2020 Implementation Schemes
summary: Programs to transform school and higher education through skill-based curriculum and digital learning.
eligibility: Schools, colleges and students under NEP rollout.
benefits: Curriculum reforms, digital tools, teacher training.

title: Mera Gaon Meri Dharohar
summary: Cultural mapping initiative to document and digitally preserve rural heritage and traditions.
eligibility: Villages identified under cultural mapping plan.
benefits: Cultural promotion, tourism support and documentation.

title: National Logistics Policy
summary: Framework to strengthen India's logistics efficiency through digital systems and multimodal transport.
eligibility: Logistics operators, states and transport sectors.
benefits: Lower logistics cost, digital integration, infrastructure support.

title: Mission LiFE (Lifestyle for Environment)
summary: Programme to encourage environmentally responsible lifestyle and reduce carbon footprint.
eligibility: Citizens, institutions and community groups.
benefits: Awareness, incentives and behavioral change programmes.

title: Rooftop Solar Phase-II (Residential Subsidy Program)
summary: Scheme for subsidising household rooftop solar installation in grid-connected areas.
eligibility: Residential electricity consumers with rooftop space.
benefits: Capital subsidy and net-metering benefits.

title: PM Adarsh Gram Yojana
summary: Scheme to develop model villages in regions with SC-dominant populations.
eligibility: SC-majority villages as per census data.
benefits: Infrastructure, livelihood support, education upgrades.

title: Digital Agriculture Mission
summary: Uses digital tools for crop assessment, advisories, farm data and real-time services.
eligibility: Farmers, FPOs and agri-institutions.
benefits: Digital records, advisory tools and precision farming support.

title: eShram Portal (Unorganised Workers Database)
summary: National database for unorganised workers including gig and platform workers.
eligibility: Unorganised workers aged 16–59 years.
benefits: Accident insurance, welfare scheme linkage.

title: Skill India Digital Platform
summary: Unified skill training and job-matching digital platform for youth.
eligibility: Students, jobseekers and trainees.
benefits: Online training, certification and placement support.

title: National Apprenticeship Training Scheme (NATS) 2.0
summary: Upgraded apprenticeship programme for engineering and diploma students.
eligibility: Graduates, diploma holders and industries.
benefits: Stipend reimbursement and skill enhancement.

title: Matsya Sampada Yojana
summary: Comprehensive fisheries development plan for marine and inland fisheries growth.
eligibility: Fishers, aquaculture farmers and FPOs.
benefits: Cold chain, processing support, infrastructure.

title: Viksit Bharat Sankalp Programmes
summary: Development missions aligned with the 2047 national vision roadmap.
eligibility: States, districts and citizens participating in planning.
benefits: Funding, reforms support, digital governance initiatives.

title: BharatNet Phase-III
summary: Broadband connectivity to all villages with high-speed optical fiber networks.
eligibility: Rural gram panchayats and villages.
benefits: High-speed internet and rural digital empowerment.

title: PM Daksh Yojana
summary: Skill development programme for SC, OBC, EBC, DNT and sanitation workers.
eligibility: Eligible castes and community groups.
benefits: Training, skilling and employment support.

title: Mukhya Mantri Ladli Behna Yojana (MP)
summary: Income-support scheme for women improving financial independence.
eligibility: Adult women residents of Madhya Pradesh meeting income criteria.
benefits: Monthly financial assistance.

title: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thogai (TN)
summary: Direct income-support scheme for women heads of households.
eligibility: Women heads of households in Tamil Nadu.
benefits: Monthly financial assistance.

title: Swarna Jayanti Shahari Rozgar Yojana
summary: Urban wage employment and skill training programme for urban poor households.
eligibility: Urban poor residents identified under scheme norms.
benefits: Skill training, wage employment and credit linkages.

title: Mukhyamantri Annapurna Scheme (Rajasthan)
summary: Food security programme providing subsidised ration to eligible families.
eligibility: Rural and urban households meeting income criteria.
benefits: Subsidised wheat, pulses and food items.

title: Mission Shakti (Women Safety & Empowerment)
summary: Integrated safety, protection and empowerment programme for women.
eligibility: Women and girls accessing support systems.
benefits: Safety services, counselling, institutional support.

title: PM-PRANAM
summary: Incentivizes states to reduce chemical fertilizer usage and adopt sustainable practices.
eligibility: States, farmers and agricultural agencies.
benefits: Incentives for fertilizer reduction and soil improvement.

title: National Cyber Security Strategy Initiatives
summary: Programmes to enhance cyber resilience across government and critical infrastructure.
eligibility: Government departments, digital service providers and institutions.
benefits: Cyber training, monitoring systems and security upgrades.

title: Indira Rasoi Yojana (Rajasthan)
summary: Subsidised cooked meal scheme ensuring no one sleeps hungry.
eligibility: All citizens, especially poor and migrant labourers.
benefits: Nutritious hot meals at affordable prices.

title: YSR Cheyutha (Andhra Pradesh)
summary: Financial support scheme for women belonging to SC, ST, BC and minority communities.
eligibility: Women aged 45–60 from eligible communities.
benefits: Annual financial assistance for entrepreneurship and livelihood.

title: Bangla Awas Yojana (West Bengal)
summary: State-level housing scheme providing financial aid for building pucca houses.
eligibility: Eligible rural households listed under state housing criteria.
benefits: Financial assistance for house construction.

title: Mission Shakti – Sambal & Samarth Components
summary: Integrated women safety, protection and empowerment programme combining protection services and capacity building.
eligibility: Women in distress, vulnerable women, and community groups as per scheme guidelines.
benefits: Shelter homes, legal aid, helplines, skill support and safety services.

title: National Mental Health Programme (NMHP)
summary: Programme strengthening mental health infrastructure, counselling services and district-level mental health units.
eligibility: All citizens requiring mental health services.
benefits: Free mental health counselling, psychiatric care, community support programmes.

title: Blue Economy Support Initiatives
summary: Schemes promoting sustainable ocean resources, fisheries development and coastal community livelihoods.
eligibility: Fisherfolk, coastal communities, MSMEs and marine projects.
benefits: Support for fisheries, marine infrastructure, value chains and sustainability measures.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fisheries Development Scheme
summary: Comprehensive support for fisheries modernisation and aquaculture infrastructure.
eligibility: Fishers, aquaculture farmers, SHGs and fisheries cooperatives.
benefits: Cold chain support, fishing equipment, value addition and subsidies.

title: National Mission on Edible Oils - Oil Palm (NMEO-OP)
summary: Boosts domestic palm oil production via cultivation support and processing infrastructure.
eligibility: Farmers in eligible palm-growing districts.
benefits: Input subsidies, plantation support, processing units and market linkages.

title: Waste to Wealth Mission
summary: Mission promoting circular economy innovations and converting waste into usable products.
eligibility: Urban local bodies, startups, research institutions and innovators.
benefits: Technology support, pilot projects, funding and municipal integration.

title: PM Gatishakti – Multi-modal Connectivity Plan
summary: National infrastructure masterplan integrating transport logistics, highways, rail, ports and airports.
eligibility: Central/state agencies and infrastructure development units.
benefits: Integrated planning, funding support, logistics efficiency improvements.

title: Green Hydrogen Policy and Mission Support
summary: Policy framework promoting green hydrogen production, storage and renewable energy integration.
eligibility: Green hydrogen producers, industries and renewable energy entities.
benefits: Incentives, grid connectivity benefits, renewable purchase flexibility.

title: Electric Mobility Incentive Programmes (EV Promotion)
summary: Central/state EV promotion measures including charging networks and electric vehicle adoption incentives.
eligibility: Consumers, EV manufacturers, fleet operators and ULBs.
benefits: Subsidies, tax support, charging infrastructure and mobility integration.

title: National Mission on Natural Farming
summary: Mission encouraging chemical-free natural farming practices and farmer training.
eligibility: Farmers and agricultural clusters adopting natural farming.
benefits: Training, demonstrations, seed and soil inputs, market linkages.

title: PM e-Vidya Digital Learning Initiative
summary: Strengthening digital learning through online platforms, TV channels and DIKSHA resources.
eligibility: Students, teachers and educational institutions.
benefits: Free digital education materials, TV channels, online classes.

title: Mission Karmayogi – Civil Services Capacity Building
summary: Civil services reform programme to improve governance through competency-based training.
eligibility: Central, state and departmental government officials.
benefits: e-learning modules, competency training, governance skill development.

title: PM Viksit Bharat Digital Infrastructure Push
summary: Initiatives to strengthen broadband connectivity, 5G reach and village-level digital infrastructure.
eligibility: Villages, telecom operators, digital providers.
benefits: Broadband expansion, common service centres and digital empowerment.

title: National Mission for Clean Ganga (Namami Gange) – Extended Components
summary: River rejuvenation initiative focusing on sewage treatment, biodiversity and community engagement.
eligibility: River basin states and implementing bodies.
benefits: Funding for STPs, afforestation, pollution control and riverfront improvement.

title: National Cyber Security Mission
summary: Strengthens national cybersecurity capabilities and digital infrastructure protection.
eligibility: Citizens, critical infrastructure agencies, industries.
benefits: Cyber awareness, security frameworks, cyber response mechanisms.

title: PM Affordable Medicines and Diagnostics (PMBJP expansion)
summary: Ensures availability of quality generic medicines at affordable prices through Jan Aushadhi centres.
eligibility: All citizens.
benefits: Low-cost medicines, diagnostics and wellness products.

title: National Logistics Policy (NLP)
summary: Improves logistics efficiency through digitization, multimodal integration and reduced transport costs.
eligibility: Logistics providers, industries, govt agencies.
benefits: Digital platforms, standardisation, reduced bottlenecks.

title: PM Daksh Yojana
summary: Skill development programme for marginalised groups such as SC, ST, OBC and sanitation workers.
eligibility: SC/ST/OBC communities and sanitation workers.
benefits: Free skill training, certification and placement support.

title: Mission LIFE (Lifestyle for Environment)
summary: Nationwide initiative encouraging sustainable lifestyle choices and environmental conservation.
eligibility: All citizens, communities and institutions.
benefits: Awareness, environmental incentives and behavioural change programmes.

title: National Green Energy Corridor
summary: Transmission network expansion to integrate renewable energy from solar and wind zones.
eligibility: State transmission utilities and renewable energy developers.
benefits: Funding support, grid integration, renewable evacuation infrastructure.

title: Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Karj Mukti Yojana
summary: Farm loan waiver scheme for small and marginal farmers.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers with eligible overdue crop loans.
benefits: Waiver of outstanding crop loans up to notified limits.

title: Khatauni Sudhar Abhiyan
summary: Digitization and correction of rural land records.
eligibility: Rural landholders requiring land record verification.
benefits: Updated digital land records and ownership correction.

title: Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyay Yojana
summary: Income support to farmers for input costs and crop incentives.
eligibility: Eligible farmers registered under state agriculture department.
benefits: Per-acre financial support for notified crop categories.

title: Swarnima Scheme for Women
summary: Soft loans to economically weaker women for self-employment.
eligibility: Women from OBC/EBC categories seeking enterprise support.
benefits: Subsidised loans with low interest rates.

title: Laadli Lakshmi Yojana
summary: Girl-child financial support scheme.
eligibility: Families with girl children meeting income criteria.
benefits: Deposits at birth and milestone incentives for education.

title: Griha Laxmi Yojana
summary: Monthly assured income support for women household heads.
eligibility: Women permanently residing in the state meeting income norms.
benefits: Monthly direct benefit transfer.

title: Swarna Jayanti Shahari Rozgar Yojana – HP Expansion
summary: Employment opportunities and skill development for urban youth.
eligibility: Urban poor households and youth as per municipal lists.
benefits: Skill development, self-employment subsidies.

title: KALIA (Krushak Assistance for Livelihood and Income Augmentation)
summary: Financial support package for farmers, landless labourers and vulnerable households.
eligibility: Small/marginal farmers and landless agricultural labourers.
benefits: Income support, insurance and livelihood grants.

title: Silaayi Machine Yojana for Women
summary: Support for women by providing sewing machines to enable self-employment.
eligibility: Economically weaker women registered in welfare lists.
benefits: Free/assisted sewing machines.

title: Mission Basundhara
summary: Online settlement of land-related services and dispute resolution.
eligibility: Landowners requiring mutation and settlement services.
benefits: Digitised land records, faster mutation services.

title: YSR Rythu Bharosa
summary: Annual income support for farmers including tenant farmers.
eligibility: Land-owning and tenant farmers registered under agriculture records.
benefits: Yearly direct financial assistance.

title: Rajiv Arogya Shri Expansion
summary: State-run cashless health insurance for low-income households.
eligibility: BPL households and eligible families as per state database.
benefits: Cashless treatment at empanelled hospitals.

title: Mukhyamantri Mahila Utkarsh Yojana
summary: Interest-free loans for women self-help groups.
eligibility: SHG women members verified by district authorities.
benefits: Interest-free bank-linked loans.

title: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thogai
summary: Monthly income support to eligible women heads of families.
eligibility: Adult women meeting income, asset and eligibility filters.
benefits: Monthly direct cash benefit.

title: Mukhyamantri Krishi Udyog Yojana
summary: Capital subsidy and support for agri-entrepreneurship.
eligibility: Farmers and agri-entrepreneurs applying for eligible units.
benefits: Subsidy for equipment, processing and storage units.

title: Sahay Hastham Self-Help Group Loan Support
summary: Emergency interest-free loans for SHG women.
eligibility: Active women SHG members.
benefits: Collateral-free loans at 0% interest.

title: MGNREGA Plus—Rajasthan Livelihood Convergence
summary: Livelihood enhancement for rural workers through bundling additional state schemes.
eligibility: MGNREGA job card holders.
benefits: Additional livelihood assets and training.

title: Swasth Bihar Initiative
summary: Strengthening primary health institutions and maternal health services.
eligibility: All citizens accessing notified health centres.
benefits: Free essential medicines and diagnostics.

title: Mukhyamantri Shramik Setu Scheme
summary: Support for migrant and construction workers via a unified portal.
eligibility: Registered labourers in state labour database.
benefits: Insurance, welfare benefits and job-matching.

title: Sanjeevini Rural Livelihood Mission
summary: Women SHG empowerment through livelihood clusters.
eligibility: Rural SHG members under mission guidelines.
benefits: Training, microfinance, enterprise support.

title: Mukhyamantri Teerth Darshan Yojana
summary: Assisted pilgrimage scheme for senior citizens.
eligibility: Senior citizens meeting income and resident criteria.
benefits: Free travel, accommodation and assistance.

title: Bangla Shashya Bima
summary: State-funded crop insurance for farmers.
eligibility: Farmers cultivating notified crops.
benefits: Compensation for crop losses without premium payment.

title: Mukhya Mantri Lok Sevak Arogya Yojana
summary: Cashless medical facilities for state government employees.
eligibility: State government employees and pensioners.
benefits: Cashless hospitalisation in empanelled hospitals.

title: Indira Rasoi Yojana
summary: Low-cost nutritious meals for urban poor.
eligibility: Open access for all citizens needing subsidized meals.
benefits: Nutritious cooked meals at nominal rates.

title: Kerala LIFE Mission
summary: Housing for homeless and landless families.
eligibility: Homeless families identified in state surveys.
benefits: Assistance for building new houses.

title: Sikkim Organic Farming Support Scheme
summary: State programme supporting organic farming practices.
eligibility: Farmers adopting organic standards.
benefits: Input subsidies and certification support.

title: Mukhyamantri Bal Seva Yojana
summary: Aid for orphaned children, including education and health support.
eligibility: Orphaned children verified by district authorities.
benefits: Monthly support, education sponsorship.

title: Shramajivi Vargiya Swasthya Bima
summary: Health insurance for unorganized workers.
eligibility: Workers registered with state labour department.
benefits: Hospitalisation and medical cover.

title: Tripura Farmer Input Support Scheme
summary: Seasonal grants for input procurement to small farmers.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers registered with agriculture department.
benefits: Direct cash assistance per season.

title: Nagaland Entrepreneurship Development Scheme
summary: Support for youth and local entrepreneurs through subsidized loans.
eligibility: Youth entrepreneurs fulfilling eligibility norms.
benefits: Loans with partial subsidy and training.
